data.title: Dadasaheb Phalke Award 2023: Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt won Best Actor
data.meta_description: SS Rajamouli’s RRR won best film of the year
data.text:
The winners list from the Dadasaheb Phalke Awards is out. The award show took place in Mumbai recently which was attended by Bollywood celebrities. The ceremony saw SS Rajamouli’s RRR (2022) winning the award in the Best film category while Alia Bhatt won the best actress award for Gangubai Kathiawadi (2022).

Check out the complete winners list here:-

Best Film: The Kashmir Files (2022)

Best Director: R Balki for Chup: Revenge of The Artist (2022)

Best Actor: Ranbir Kapoor for Brahmastra Part One: Shiva (2022)

Best Actress: Alia Bhatt for Gangubai Kathiawadi (2022)

Most Promising Actor: Rishab Shetty for Kantara (2022)

Outstanding Contribution In The Film Industry: Rekha

Best Web Series: Rudra: The Edge of Darkness

Critics Best Actor: Varun Dhawan for Bhediya (2022)

Film of The Year: RRR (2022)

Television Series of The Year: Anupamaa

Most Versatile Actor Of The Year: Anupam Kher for The Kashmir Files

Best Actor In A Television Series: Zain Imam for Fanaa - Ishq Mein Marjawan

Best Male Singer: Sachet Tandon for Maiyya Mainu (Jersey, 2022)

Best Female Singer: Neeti Mohan for Meri Jaan (Gangubai Kathiawadi, 2022)

Best Cinematographer: PS Vinod for Vikram Vedha (2022)

Outstanding Contribution In The Music Industry: Hariharan
